highlights: Provided production support for a multi-component Java-Spring Boot Web API running on AWS.
Migrated pre-existing on-prem code to AWS, utilizing Jenkins, UCD, & Nexus for seamless CICD integrations.
Collaborated on microservice design & implementation breaking up our migrated monolithic code.
Created & oversaw production documentation & deployments quarterly (or more).
Designed, developed, tested, & maintained many new & existing APIs.
Collaborated to develop & maintain Angular UI & it's CICD integrations.
Automated a Data Batch Processor utilizing AWS EventBridge, StepFunctions, & Lambda to streamline data changes in RDS.
Integrated Lambda Layers to centralize certification(s) & dependency management among all Lambdas.
Implemented & maintained industry standard scanning tools (SAST, SCA, DAST) for vulnerability protection.
Integrated global standard logging & exception handling across all Java components.
Led efforts in security analyzation & prevention against 3rd party dependencies.
Collaborated to integrate automated, one-touch failover for all AWS components using Route53, Lambda, & Enterprise Integrations.
Provided daily feedback, progress, & design input with team-leads & product owners.
Heavily involved in team Agile processes; Collaboration on Confluence, sprint-planning in JIRA, ticket creation, & team coordination.
Developed training documentation for new developers/testers to streamline the onboarding process of our application.
Onboarded & integrated User to Service & Service to Service relationships behind Apigee using OAuth2, JWT, & an adherence to Enterprise SSL/TLS Standards
Instructed students on Java full-stack development, covering core Java OOP principles, Spring Framework, & integrating front-end UI with backend services for a seamless application architecture.
Led hands-on workshops on front-end development using Angular, guiding through module creation, event binding, & routing.
Taught best practices in version control using Git & Bitbucket for managing repositories & collaborating effectively.
Built, Developed, & Tested RESTful APIs.
Integrated a one touch automated testing suite in Jmeter to test a series of APIs.
Created & maintained a configuration driven test scenario suite for common API call types.
Collaborated on creating a Selenium Suite of tests for daily automated testing of Web APIs.
